description: consoleauth manager is hard coded to use remote conductor
title: nova consoleauth depends on Conductor Service

comments.content: consoleauth manager is hard coded to use remote conductor
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sorrison

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/31159
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/6c6e43e466a5383b3ef3c852c9b2749f0fad64dc

Branch:    master

commit 6c6e43e466a5383b3ef3c852c9b2749f0fad64dc
Author: Sam Morrison <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri May 31 15:03:25 2013 +1000

    Fix bug where consoleauth depended on remote conductor service
    
    Fixes bug 1186123
    
    Conductor API was being imported directly so ignoring use_local FLAG
    
    Change-Id: I055a5301d4c18d201d67f114047f503114751603
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
